componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn

channel.description: doping of a transistor's channel - describes whether a transistor is n-type or p-type

transistorCount.description: number of transistors in the package

vgsMax.description: maximum gate to source voltage difference that can be continously applied to a mosfet

vdsMax.description: maximum drain to source voltage difference that can be continously applied to a mosfet

vdsBreakdownVoltage.description: drain to source breakdown voltage of a mosfet

vgsThresholdMax.description: maximum gate to source voltage difference required to produce a conducting path between drain and source

vgsThreshold.description: gate to source voltage difference (VGS) required to produce a conducting path between drain and source

vsdDiodeForwardVoltage.description: reverse diode forward voltage when a mosfet is in off-state

iDrain.description: maximum continous DC current that can flow through a mosfet channel

idPulsed.description: maximum pulsed DC current that can flow through a mosfet channel

iDss.description: drain-source leakage current of a mosfet when the gate to source voltage difference is zero

iGss.description: gate-source leakage current of a mosfet when the drain to source voltage difference is zero

diodeContinuousCurrent.description: maximum continuous forward current of the body diode of a mosfet (Is)

diodePulsedCurrent.description: maximum pulsed forward current of the body diode of a mosfet

forwardTransconductance.description: signal gain, change in drain current with variation of gate-source voltage of a mosfet (Gfs)

rdson.description: drain source on resistance of a mosfet

crss.description: reverse transfer capacitance of a mosfet

qg.description: total gate charge of a mosfet
qg.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qgd.description: gate to drain charge of a mosfet

qgs.description: gate to source charge of a mosfet

qrr.description: reverse recovery charge of the body diode of a mosfet

idVsVds.description: graph of drain current (Id) vs drain source voltage (Vds)

idVsVgs.description: graph of drain current (Id) vs gate source voltage (Vgs)

tdON.description: turn on delay time of a mosfet
tdON.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value

tdOFF.description: turn off delay time of a mosfet
tdOFF.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value

riseTime.description: turn on rise time of a mosfet
riseTime.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value

fallTime.description: turn off fall time of a mosfet
fallTime.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value

trr.description: reverse recovery time of the body diode of a mosfet
trr.$comment: conditions include body diode forward current value and ramp rate

pins.description: array of pin objects with associated properties

componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn

vf.comment: conditions include: forward current of diode under which a given forward voltage was measured

ifm.description: maximum continuous forward current a diode can support

ifrm.description: maximum repetitive peak forward current a diode can support

ifsm.description: maximum non-repetitive surge forward current a diode can support

ir.comment: conditions include: reverse bias voltage under which reverse leakage current occurs

vz.description: breakdown voltage of a zener diode
vz.comment: conditions include: minimum reverse current condition under which breakdown voltage of a zener diode is achieved

vrm.description: reverse standoff voltage of a tvs diode

vcl.description: clamping voltage of a tvs diode
vcl.comment: conditions include: surge current condition under which a tvs clamping voltage occurs

esdProtection.description: whether a diode has built in esd protection

pins.description: array of pin objects with associated properties
